text: This event is triggered whenever the execution of a workflow, or of a workflow group, is either suspended or enabled for execution in the Suspend Execution configuration. This event type includes the following fields: Groups - A comma separated list of names of suspended or enabled workflow groups. SuspendExecutionAction - (Boolean) True for enabled, and False for suspended. SuspendExecutionConfiguration - (string) The name of the Suspend Execution configuration which scheduling settings triggered this event. Workflows - A comma separated list of names of suspended or enabled workflows. Fields inherited from the Base event The following fields are inherited from the Base event, and described in more detail in Base Event : category contents eventName origin receiveTimeStamp severity timeStamp
title: Suspend Execution Event - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
